meanings: (전쟁) actual fight[battle, warfare], (스포츠) real game[match, fight]
a veteran of considerable combat experience

vlive.korean: [실전에 돌입!] [드디어 시작된 양궁 경기!] [Right into the actual game] [Archery, game on!] View video ITZY : [ITZY? ITZY!(있지?있지!)] EP47. 아육대에 있지!
vlive.english: [Right into the actual game] [Archery, game on!]

vlive.korean: 한번 딱... 실전 공연이다! Once... This is the actual performance! 듣기 View video N.Flying : Get Ready to 'UP ALL NIGHT' IN MANILA
vlive.english: Once... This is the actual performance!

vlive.korean: 제가 실전에서 못한 거니까... I didn't do well in front of the camera. 듣기 View video Mnet : 프로듀스101 시즌2 2화
vlive.english: I didn't do well in front of the camera.

vlive.korean: 실전에 나왔을 때? When you out and working? 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : 'IDOL RADIO' ep#119. 무엇이든 물어보세요 (w. 체리블렛)
[이제 실전만 남았다!] [Only the true test left!] View video 세이브펫챌린지 SAVE PET CHALLENGE : 손담비! 검은개 프로젝트 첫번째 주자로 세이브펫챌린지에 도전하다 [세이브펫챌린] 14회

examples.korean: I have both the theoretical knowledge and the practical experience to handle almost all the challenges that will arise while doing this job. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 저는 이 일을 수행하는 동안 발생할 거의 모든 도전과제를 처리할 이론상의 지식과 실전 경험 양쪽을 다 갖고 있습니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: I have both the theoretical knowledge and the practical experience to handle almost all the challenges that will arise while doing this job. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I play to win, whether during practice or a real game. And I will not let anything get in the way of me and my competitive enthusiasm to win. (Michael Jordan) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 연습에서든 실전에서든 이기기 위해 농구를 한다. 그 어떤 것도 승리를 향한 나의 경쟁적 열정에 방해가 되도록 하지 않겠다. (마이클 조던, 성공명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: I play to win, whether during practice or a real game. And I will not let anything get in the way of me and my competitive enthusiasm to win. (Michael Jordan) Add to Wordbook
